subject: Noise complaint from upstairs neighbor
description: Resident reports loud music and footsteps from unit 401 during late night hours. Issue has been ongoing for several days.
summary: Ongoing noise complaint requiring neighbor mediation and policy enforcement.

subject: Parking stall blocked by visitor
description: Assigned parking stall P-23 has been blocked by an unknown vehicle for 3 days. Resident cannot park in designated spot.
summary: Blocked parking stall requiring immediate towing action.

subject: Kitchen faucet leak repair
description: Kitchen faucet has developed a significant leak. Water is dripping constantly and resident is concerned about water damage.
summary: Kitchen faucet leak requiring plumber assessment and repair approval.

subject: Elevator maintenance scheduling
description: Annual elevator inspection and maintenance needs to be scheduled. Building has two elevators that require coordinated service.
summary: Annual elevator inspection and maintenance coordination required.

subject: Guest suite booking inquiry
description: Resident wants to book the guest suite for family visit next month. Needs availability and booking process information.
resolution_notes: Provided booking form and available dates. Guest suite booked for Nov 25-27.
summary: Guest suite booking inquiry successfully resolved with reservation confirmed.

subject: Package delivery issue
description: Multiple packages have gone missing from the mailroom. Resident suspects theft and wants security review.
summary: Missing packages requiring security camera review and policy updates.
